name: Chambers of Obstacles
description:
Short top-down puzzle game on theme It's A Trap. 

Two brothers were playing in the dark forest far from their home. One of them didn't notice a hole in a ground while running from his brother and fell in.  When the boy woke up he was surrounded only by the cold and damp walls of the dungeon.

  • W, A, S, D/Arrow keys - Movement
  • Spacebar - Action/Menu key
  • F - Fullscreen
